title: What popular songs mention American whiskey in the lyrics? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you really want songs about whiskey drinking try Irish and Scotish folk tunes. I don't know how American the whiskey is but....... Snortin' Whiskey - Pat Travers Cocaine Blues - Johnny Cash Whiskey River 2- Willie Nelson Whiskey Glasses - Morgan Wallen One Bourbon One Scotch, One Beer- George Thorogood & The Destroyers I Drink Alone - George Thorogood & The Destroyers Dear Doctor - The Rolling Stones. (Smooth As) Tennessee Whiskey- Chris Stapleton Whiskey and You - Chris Stapleton Whiskey's Gone - Zac Brown Band The Whiskey Ain't Workin' - Travis Tritt Drowns the Whiskey - Jason Aldean Alabama Song (Whisky Bar) - The Doors Whiskey Girl - Toby Keith Beer for My Horse - Toby Keith Nobody Knows You When You’re Down and Out - Derek and the Dominos. Rollin’ And Tumblin’ - Muddy Waters. American Honey - Lady Antebellum Ain’t Worth the Whiskey - Cole Swindell Women Without Whiskey - Drive-By Truckers Whiskey’n Mama - ZZ Top Whiskey in the Jar - Metallica Poison Whiskey - Lynyrd Skynyrd Whiskey, Whiskey, Whiskey - John Mayer Whiskey Glasses - Morgan Wallen Lace and Whiskey- Alice Cooper Blue Turk - Alice Cooper Take Your Whiskey Home - Van Halen Whiskey Trail - Los Lobos Whiskey Lullaby- Brad Paisley and Alison Krauss Cheap Whiskey - Martina McBride The Whiskey Ain't Workin' Anymore - Marty Stuart Jack Daniel's, If You Please - David Allan Coe Whiskey, Whiskey- Kris Kristofferson Whiskey Trip - Gary Stewart Whiskey Bent and Hell Bound- Hank Williams Jr. Whiskey On Ice- Hank Williams Jr. Hotel Whiskey - Hank Williams Jr. Whiskey to Wine- Garth Brooks C.C. Waterback- Merle Haggard Time to Switch to Whiskey - Corb Lund and the Hurtin' Albertans The Cowboy and the Poet (Faster Horses)- Bobby Bare Sunshine & Whiskey - Frankie Ballard Whiskey in My Whiskey- The Felice Brothers Whiskey, If You Were a Woman - Highway 101 If My Name Was Whiskey - Carly Pearce What Whiskey Does- Randy Houser Must Be The Whiskey - Cody Jinks Whiskey Under the Bridge - Brooks & Dunn Whiskey'd Up - Jason Aldean Pour Whiskey on My Grave - Jacob Bryant It Ain't The Whiskey - Gary Allan Whiskey On My Breath - Love and Theft Wine, Beer, Whiskey - Little Big Town Another Shot of Whiskey - The Gits Wine After Whiskey - Carrie Underwood Drinkin' Dark Whiskey- Gary Allan Jack Daniels - Miranda Lambert She Don't Drink Whiskey Anymore- Tim Hicks Whiskey in My Water - Tyler Farr

I can think of several whiskey river sang by Willie Nelson. Whiskey lullaby Alison Krauss. Carrie underwood wine after whiskey Johnny Cash wrote a boy named Sue in it he mentions a bottle of booze. One bourbon one scotch and one beer by John Lee Hooker. Before somebody writes a post remember scotch rye Bourbon are whiskeys I believe all scotch are whiskey but not all whiskeys are Scotch whiskey. There are several songs I could mention like this that mention alcohol but it’s debatable whether it’s whiskey like white lightning search Jones. I don’t know if you could call white lightning whiskey. And I don’t want to start a controversy because there are several popular songs that mention alcohol. Which could be whiskey. Tony Bennett’s one for the road leave it to your imagination he doesn’t say what he’s drinking but I bet my bottom dollar it’s whiskey. Then there’s the American classic rye whiskey Pete Seeger. Honorable mention all I wanna do is have some fun Sheryl crow doesn’t mention whiskey but really is a bar song. They’re probably more bar songs or songs about alcohol and more songs that mention whiskey but right now I can’t think of them.
